attributes.action: To make Land of Hope and Glory or Jerusalem, England's national anthem
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
England has been too long without its own national anthem.  God Save the Queen is the British national anthem not England's.

It is important for each of the cultures of Britain to have it its own identity including national anthems.  

So please Mr Brown allow England to have its own identity apart from that of Britain.

The popular choices would be:

Land of Hope and Glory by A. C. Benson.  

Or Jerusalem by Blake
